text:
#NotThrowingAwayMyShot 

According to a reliable source (direct observation),  #COVID19 #vaccine doses are being discarded!  

If no more priority #patients in a day, extra doses should *NOT* be tossed; they should be given to *any* adult 

Act locally! Make it so! #HerdImmunity https://t.co/VkyzmhbJG9
